message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it's truly valuable and will greatly benefit you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12,000. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $14,000. Can you meet me at this price?
